descriptionlist.description: This package is a replacement for the Siri "Beep" sounds This does NOT replace ALL of Siri, This will also OVERWRITE your current Siri Sounds!
After this installationi of this package REBOOT your iDevice! After removal DO NOT REBOOT! Instead navigate to (seen after adding the repo in Cydia)"Original Siri Sounds" and install that THEN REBOOT
To backup your current Siri sounds navigate to iFile then go to /System/Audio/UISounds and select all the sounds that begin with the prefix "jbl" and .ZIP them up with the little box at the bottom!
